panels.description: The cluster status

targets.expr: (sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_timeouts{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)) + (sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_read_timeouts{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0))>0

panels.title: Status

panels.description: The percentage of the time during which Scylla utilized the CPU. Note that because Scylla does busy polling for some time before going idle, CPU utilization as seen by the operating system may be much higher. Your system is not yet CPU-bottlenecked until this metric is high.
panels.title: Load

panels.description: The number of nodes configured in the cluster.
panels.title: # Nodes

panels.description:
The number of CPU Cores actively used in the cluster.

Note that CPU Cores that belongs to unreachable nodes, or nodes that are not in normal mode, will not be counted
panels.title: # Cores

panels.description: Data Reduction Ratio, percentage of disk space saved due to compression
panels.title: DRR

panels.description: Disk Usage
panels.title: Disk

panels.description: Total Operations per seconds

targets.expr: (sum(rate(scylla_alternator_operation{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]", op !~"Batch.*"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0))+ on() (sum(rate(scylla_alternator_batch_item_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0))

panels.title: Total Operations/s

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_table_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op=~"$ops"}[$__rate_interval])>0) by (op, le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op=~"$ops_batch"}[$__rate_interval])>0) by (op, le))

panels.description: Number of Alternator Operations by operation type
panels.title: Total Operations/s

panels.description: The P95 Latencies per operation
panels.title: P95 Latencies

panels.description: The P99 Latencies per operation
panels.title: P99 Latencies

targets.expr: $func(rate(scylla_alternator_table_op_latency_sum{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], cf)/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_table_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], cf) + 1)

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_table_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], cf, le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_table_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], cf, le))

$func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_sum{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$ops_batch"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$ops_batch"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) + 1)

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$ops_batch"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$ops_batch"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], le))

value.title: OS Information Dashboard, an Error indicates there are OS related errors

targets.expr: 0*scylla_scylladb_current_version{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"} + on (instance) group_left() (scylla_node_operation_mode{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}!= 3 or on (instance) ((scylla_gossip_live{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}+1<  bool scalar(count(scylla_node_operation_mode{cluster="$cluster"}==3)))*6 + 3))

(min(scylla_streaming_finished_percentage{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}*100) by (instance) < 100) or on (instance)  0*sum(scylla_scylladb_current_version{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}) by (instance)

options.content: Cluster wide Data Plane Action

panels.description: The number of items processed as a result of BatchWriteItem
panels.title: Operations from BatchWriteItem $func by [[by]]

panels.description: The avarage batch size of BatchWriteItem

targets.expr: $func(rate(scylla_alternator_batch_item_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="BatchWriteItem"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])/$func(rate(scylla_alternator_operation{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="BatchWriteItem"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])

panels.title: Average Batch size of BatchWriteItem $func by [[by]]

panels.description: The number of items processed as a result of BatchGetItem
panels.title: Operations from BatchGetItem $func by [[by]]

panels.description: The avarage batch size of BatchGetItem

targets.expr: $func(rate(scylla_alternator_batch_item_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="BatchGetItem"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])/$func(rate(scylla_alternator_operation{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="BatchGetItem"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])

panels.title: Average Batch size of BatchGetItem $func by [[by]]

panels.description: The number of items deleted $func by their TTL
panels.title: Expired Item Deleted $func by [[by]]

targets.expr: $func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) or on() $func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])

scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary{quantile="0.5", by="$by", instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"} or on() $func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_sum{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_count{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) + 1)

scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary{quantile="0.95", by="$by", instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"} or on () histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], le))

scylla_alternator_op_latency_summary{quantile="0.99", by="$by", instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"} or on () histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(scylla_alternator_op_latency_bucket{instance=~"[[node]]",cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]|$^", op="$alternator_streams_latency_ops"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]], le))

options.content: Control Plane Actions

panels.description: Number of rows that were read from the cache, without needing to be fetched from storage.
panels.title: Cache Hits $func by [[by]]

panels.description: Number of rows that were not present in the cache, and had to be fetched from storage.
panels.title: Cache Misses $func by [[by]]

panels.description: Requests that Scylla tried to write but timed out. Timeouts are counted in the node that received the request (the coordinator), not at the replicas.
panels.title: Write Timeouts/s $func by [[by]]

panels.description: Requests that Scylla tried to read but timed out. Timeouts are counted in the node that received the request (the coordinator), not at the replicas.
panels.title: Read Timeouts/s $func by [[by]]

panels.description: The current number of opened connections
panels.title: HTTP Opened connections $func by [[by]]

panels.description: Rate of new HTTP connections creation. High number may indicate a problem
panels.title: HTTP New connections $func by [[by]]

panels.description: Alterantor expression cache

targets.expr: $func(rate(scylla_alternator_expression_cache_hits{cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]],expression)/($func(rate(scylla_alternator_expression_cache_hits{cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]],expression) + $func(rate(scylla_alternator_expression_cache_misses{cluster=~"$cluster|$^", dc=~"$dc", shard=~"[[shard]]"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]],expression))

panels.title: Expression Cache hit ratio $func by [[by]]

panels.description: Alterantor expression cache eviction rate
panels.title: Expression Cache eviction rate $func by [[by]]
